Limited Time Discounts for the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP)
Protect against the burden of unexpected maintenance costs with the Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP), a maintenance service program covering more than 50 different platforms. Honeywell is offering discounts now through June 30, 2017. Operators are eligible for HAPP discounts when participating in the DU-875 upgrade.
Benefits of enrollment
- Discounts are valid for multiple years - Supports DU-870 exchanges until 2020 - Immediate savings within first year
